item.title: 华尔街史诗般卷土重来，市场未解之谜层出不穷
item.description: 这是华尔街重振雄风的一周。股市上演了一出万有引力的反弹，抹平了四月关税冲击带来的所有损失，美国企业释放了数十亿压抑已久的债券销售，从加密货币到无利可图的科技公司等投机资产飙升。【原文：It was the week Wall Street got its swagger back. Stocks staged a gravity-defying rebound to wipe out all losses from April’s tariff shock, Corporate America unleashed billions in pent-up bond sales and speculative assets from crypto to unprofitable tech companies surged.】

item.title: I Squared 即将就价值 50 亿美元的马特宏峰管道达成协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，以 I Squared Capital 为首的一个财团正在考虑收购 Matterhorn Express 管道公司，包括债务在内，该德克萨斯州天然气管道公司的估值约为 50 亿美元。【原文：A consortium led by I Squared Capital is considering buying Matterhorn Express Pipeline in a deal that would value the Texas natural gas conduit at about $5 billion including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国指定破坏海地稳定的帮派为恐怖组织
item.description: 美国将两个强大的海地帮派认定为 "外国恐怖组织"，指责它们破坏国家稳定并威胁美国利益，从而加大了对控制该国大部分贸易的这两个帮派的压力。【原文：The US designated two powerful Haitian gangs it accused of destabilizing the country and threatening US interests as “Foreign Terrorist Organizations,” escalating pressure on the groups that control much of the country’s trade.】

item.title: 美国以雅虎日本交易为由要求谷歌共享数据
item.description: 美国反垄断执法人员追溯到谷歌 15 年前达成的一项协议，认为 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌应该再次与第三方共享信息，这一次是为了结束其对在线搜索的非法垄断。【原文：US antitrust enforcers reached back to a deal Google struck 15 years ago to argue that the Alphabet Inc. unit should once again share information with third parties, this time to end its illegal monopoly of online search.】

item.title: 摩根大通的斯彭斯规划了一条通往 1 万亿美元 ETF 资产的道路
item.description:
JPMAM的ETF全球主管特拉维斯-斯彭斯（Travis Spence）认为，未来五年公司的ETF资产将达到这一里程碑。【原文：

Travis Spence, JPMAM’s global head of ETFs, thinks the firm can hit that milestone for ETF assets over the next five years.

】

item.title: 小型物流公司因计划购买特朗普纪念币而股价大涨
item.description: 一家小型物流公司计划将唐纳德-特朗普总统的memecoin作为国库资产持有，这推动了该公司股价大涨。【原文：A small logistics company’s plan to hold President Donald Trump’s memecoin as a treasury asset is fueling its blistering stock rally.】

item.title: 芝加哥开始寻找新的市政债券承销商
item.description: 在两个主要市场参与者退出后，芝加哥正在寻找新的承销商名单，以监督其市政债券销售。【原文：Chicago is looking for a new roster of underwriters to oversee its municipal bond sales after the exit of two key market players opened up opportunities for other firms.】

item.title: 葡萄牙称国防投资可能已达到国内生产总值的 1.58
item.description: 到 2024 年，葡萄牙的国防投资估计将达到国内生产总值的 1.58%，超过此前的预测。【原文：Portugal’s defense investment may have reached an estimated 1.58% of gross domestic product in 2024, more than previously forecast.】

item.title: 玩家有太多选择，不愿意花 80 美元购买电子游戏
item.description:
随着 Xbox 宣布提价，本年度最受好评的游戏均为经济型游戏

。【原文：

As Xbox announces a price hike, the year’s best-reviewed games are all budget titles

】

item.title: 苹果与 Anthropic 合作打造人工智能 "振动编码 "平台
item.description: 苹果公司正在与初创公司 Anthropic PBC 合作开发一个新的 "振动编码 "软件平台，该平台将使用人工智能来代替程序员编写、编辑和测试代码。【原文：Apple Inc. is teaming up with startup Anthropic PBC on a new “vibe-coding” software platform that will use artificial intelligence to write, edit and test code on behalf of programmers.】

item.title: 创始人计划离职，Blackstone 支持的 Antara 正在清算
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone 公司支持的 Antara Capital 正在进行清盘，计划清算其剩余投资。【原文：Blackstone Inc.-backed Antara Capital is pursuing a wind-down with plans to liquidate its remaining investments, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 申银万国伦敦首次公开募股在美国关税风波中搁浅
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于零售商正在评估美国关税对其业务的影响，并等待监管部门的批准，申银万国集团有限公司的首次公开募股计划已经放缓。【原文：Shein Group Ltd.’s initial public offering plan has slowed to a crawl as the retailer assesses the impact of US tariffs on its business and awaits regulatory approvals, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧佩克+在电话会议前讨论增产 40 万桶
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+主要成员国正在讨论在周六召开制定政策的视频会议之前，于6月份再次增产约40万桶。【原文：Key OPEC+ nations are discussing making another production increase of roughly 400,000 barrels a day in June ahead of a video-conference to set policy on Saturday, delegates said.】

item.title: 金多斯告诉《新闻报》，欧洲央行可以对通胀持乐观态度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲中央银行有信心将通胀率恢复到 2% 的目标。【原文：The European Central Bank can be confident on returning inflation to the 2% goal, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 司法部请求联邦法官分拆谷歌广告技术业务
item.description: 美国司法部要求联邦法官迫使 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司出售其广告技术的关键部分，并与竞争对手共享实时数据，以应对该技术巨头非法垄断网络广告投放市场的裁决。【原文：The US Justice Department asked a federal judge to force Alphabet Inc.’s Google to sell key parts of its advertising technology and share realtime data with competitors to address a ruling that the technology giant illegally monopolizes much of the market for placing ads around the web.】

item.title: 网络侵权升级，虚假信息专家联合起来
item.description: 2025 年 4 月 24 日星期四，美国纽约日耳曼敦，埃隆-马斯克的 X 账户被安排在智能手机上。埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 控股公司（X Holdings Corp.摄影师：加比-琼斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Elon Musk's X account on a smartphone arranged in Germantown, New York, US, on Thursday, April 24, 2025. Elon Musk's X Holdings Corp. is evolving from a social media platform powered by mainstream advertisers to one betting on dollars generated from artificial intelligence and subscriptions, a change that appears to have buoyed its revenue lately. Photographer: Gabby Jones/Bloomberg】

item.title: 亚马逊购买纽约第五大道靠近中央车站的办公大楼
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）购买了第五大道（Fifth Avenue）上的一座办公大楼，增加了其在曼哈顿的房地产资产。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. added to its Manhattan real estate holdings with the purchase of an office tower on Fifth Avenue.】

item.title: 纳米比亚加入央行抢金大战以抵御冲击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对其贸易伙伴征收关税后，全球不确定性加剧，纳米比亚央行计划加入其他国家的行列，在外汇储备组合中增加黄金，作为应对全球不确定性的缓冲。【原文：Namibia’s central bank plans to join others that are adding gold to their foreign-exchange reserve mix as a buffer against global uncertainty that’s intensified since US President Donald Trump slapped tariffs on its trading partners.】

item.title: 龙之队 "黑客团伙为英国零售业攻击立功
item.description: 一个黑客犯罪团伙为过去两周针对英国零售商的破坏性网络攻击活动立下了汗马功劳。【原文：A criminal hacking gang has taken credit for a disruptive campaign of cyberattacks targeting British retailers over the last two weeks.】

item.title: 特朗普减免汽车关税，USMCA 汽车零部件免征 25% 税款
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普修订后的汽车关税计划继续— 至少目前是— 对符合横跨北美的自由贸易协定的零部件实行豁免，这是汽车行业极力争取的让步。【原文：President Donald Trump’s revised auto tariff plan continues — at least for now — an exemption for parts that comply with the free trade agreement spanning North America, a concession desperately sought by industry.】

item.title: 优步与中国 Momenta 合作在欧洲推广机器人出租车
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）宣布将与北京摩门塔科技有限公司（Beijing Momenta Technology Co.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. announced it’s partnering with Beijing Momenta Technology Co. to deploy robotaxis on the ridesharing platform in various global markets, starting in Europe in early 2026.】

item.title: 中国市场收紧，交易商缩减LME铜库存
item.description: 包括特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）和摩古里亚能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）在内的交易商正在削减伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）的铜库存，原因是尽管市场担心经济衰退，但中国的强劲买盘收紧了铜这一风向标金属的市场。【原文：Traders including Trafigura Group and Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. are drawing down stocks of copper on the London Metal Exchange, as strong Chinese buying tightens the market for the bellwether metal despite fears of recession.】

item.title: 据说 EToro 考虑最快下周在美国上市
item.description: EToro Group Ltd.正在考虑最快于下周在美国进行首次公开募股，此前该交易和投资平台曾因关税相关的股票波动而暂停上市计划。【原文：EToro Group Ltd. is considering launching its US initial public offering as soon as next week, after the trading and investment platform paused its listing plans amid tariff-related stock volatility.】

item.title: 周五是高等级债券投资者最昂贵的交易日
item.description: 对特朗普政府周末可能发布的影响市场的消息的担忧加剧了美国投资级公司债券周五交易成本的飙升。【原文：Worries about potential market-moving weekend news from the Trump administration has fueled a surge in Friday trading costs for US investment-grade corporate bonds.】

item.title: 巴克莱将美联储下一次降息的预测从 6 月推至 7 月
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）的经济学家们在一份强于预期的薪资报告公布后，将他们预测美联储降息的时间从 6 月份推迟到了 7 月份。【原文：Economists at Barclays delayed the timing of their predication for the Federal Reserve to cut rates to July, from June, following a stronger-than-expected payroll report.】

item.title: 阿波罗的罗文预计外国支持者将限制美国投资
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）说，如果 "目前的趋势继续下去"，外国投资者将减少对美国的投资，但他预计这不会对他的业务产生大的影响。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan said foreign investors will curb their allocations to the US if “current trends continue,” but he doesn’t expect it to have a big effect on his business.】

item.title: 德马克称熊市即将来临，S&P 500 指数反弹即将停滞
item.description: 资深技术策略师汤姆-德马克（Tom DeMark）认为，美股将再次下跌，并最终导致未来几个月的熊市。【原文：US stocks are in for another drop that will eventually lead to a bear market in the coming months, according to veteran technical strategist Tom DeMark, who accurately called this year’s top in February and subsequent April low.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德可再生能源公司在艰难市场中寻求分割交易
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）反复无常的贸易政策打压股价，布鲁克菲尔德可再生能源合伙公司（Brookfield Renewable Partners）正在公开市场寻找分割机会。【原文：Brookfield Renewable Partners is hunting for carve-out opportunities in public markets as US President Donald Trump’s erratic trade policy depresses stock prices.】

item.title: 对全球贸易谈判的乐观情绪加剧美元一周跌势
item.description: 由于贸易协议的前景引发了对其他货币的需求，美元指数周五下跌，在过去五周中第四次收低。【原文：A dollar gauge dropped Friday, ending lower for the fourth time in the last five weeks, as the prospect of trade deals created an appetite for other currencies.】

item.title: 雪佛龙首席执行官称，赫斯公司可能在关闭后几天内完成整合
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.雪佛龙公司首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）表示，他对公司在与埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）的仲裁案中胜诉并完成 530 亿美元收购赫斯公司（Hess Corp）的交易仍充满信心。【原文：Chevron Corp. Chief Executive Officer Mike Wirth says he remains confident his company will prevail against in an arbitration case against Exxon Mobil Corp. and close its $53 billion deal to buy Hess Corp.】
